item.title: About
item.description: Like some others, I’m trying to spend more time doing things that I love so I don’t waste most of my life chasing some societal idea of “success”. My list of interests and hobbies keep growing but traveling ðŸŒŽ and biking ðŸš´ are on top of that list.
